attributes.action: Legalise the sale and growth of cannabis (thc) plants and plant based products.
attributes.additional_details:
Discuss the options and benefits that having an open market on cannabis and cannabis products in the uk. To apply a tax to the products to generate revenue to help fund the UK after covid-19. We could then export our products around the globe with the potential of generating a large revenue.
We could have a large footing and possibly lead the global cannabis market. With our independence from Europe this could be very beneficial to our economy.
attributes.background:
To fully legalise these things. 
- growing cannabis plants for private or commercial use.
- allow people to obtain prescriptions to have cannabis for medicinal benefits.
-  allow people to use cannabis (thc) for recreational purposes. 
- Full Decriminalisation of cannabis
